column2: "Hɔn a wɔtwer EWURADZE no Wɔtse dɛ mbepɔw Zion a onnhihim
"Dɛ mbrɛ mbepɔw etwa Jerusalɛm ho ehyia no
column3: Dɛmara so na EWURADZE etwa ne man ho ehyia
column4: Ofitsi aber yi dze kesi daapem."

column2: "Na emumuyɛ ahempoma nnkɛtsena atseneneefo kyɛpɛn do; Amma atseneneefo anntsen hɔn nsa annka emumuyɛ."

column3: ma onsi hɔn a wodzi w'asɛm do no yie
column4: Na hɔn a wɔtsen wɔ hɔn akoma mu no."

column2: "Na hɔn a wɔman fa hɔn akwan kyew do dze
column3: EWURADZE dze hɔn bɛka emumuyɛfo ho akɔ. Asomdwee mbra Israel do."
